name: Oldies Observations On Love Quiz | Music by Year | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'It's nothing like I ever thought it would be'

questions.explanation:
Gene Pitney.

	'It Hurts to be in Love'

questions.text: 'I'll be your love till the end of time'
'Love is more than just holding hands'

questions.explanation:
Dionne Warwick.

	'I'll Never Fall In Love Again'

Lenny Welch.

	'Since I Fell For You'

questions.text: 'You're the one I want to go through time with'
questions.explanation:
Jim Croce.

	'Time In A Bottle'NB Written in 1969 but not released as a single until after Croce's death in 1973.

questions.text: 'Without your sweet love, what would life be?'
You have made my life complete'
questions.explanation:
Elvis Presley.

	'Love Me Tender'. (Actually, this is from the the 50's).
